# Ingredients

- 1 cup oats
- 0.5 cup almond butter
- 0.25 cup ground flaxseed (healthy fats and fiber)
- 0.25 cup honey
- 0.5 cup chocolate chips or dried cranberries (for a sweet boost)
- Pinch of salt

# Instructions
- Combine all ingredients in a food processor and pulse until a paste forms
- Shape into balls and store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 5 days
